item.title: Apple Has Shut Down The Bat Player
item.description: Today The Bat Player on AppleTV was shut down. I wanted to document a bit about the history of the application, and why it’s being rejected from the Apple AppStore. I started The Bat Player in 2014. I wanted a better Internet Radio experience on the TV. I dreamt of artist info, album details and photos. At the time most Internet Radio apps just showed text of the currently playing track and I wanted more.
